description:
The Gamers Meet-up gets together at Chiaki’s place to play a board game. The seems to reveal – or maybe even predict – something about the gang’s relationship with each other.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Erogame to Kansen Mode / Gamers to Hansei Game
Erogamer and Watching Mode / Gamers and Half Their Life Game
Erogamer und Zuschauermodus / Gamers und Spiel des halben Lebens
Jeux érotiques et mode spectateur – Les gamers et le jeu du destin
エロゲーマーと観戦モード / ゲーマーズと半生ゲーム
